price: 19. Maka apakah (engkau hendak mengubah nasib) orang-orang yang telah dipastikan mendapat azab? Apakah engkau (Muhammad) akan menyelamatkan orang yang berada dalam api neraka?
arabic: أَفَمَنۡ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afaman ḥaqqa ʿalayhi kalimatu al-ʿadhābi afa-anta tunqidhu man fī al-nāri
